StringBuf

type
class
available in
neko, flash9, php, flash8, flash7, flash6
A String buffer is an efficient way to build a big string by appending small elements together.

Static Variables

private __add : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

private __add_char : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

private __add_sub : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

private __make : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

private __string : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

Constructor

public new()
Creates a new string buffer.

Instance Variables

private b : Dynamic

platforms:
neko

private b : String

platforms:
flash9, php, flash8, flash7, flash6

Instance Methods

public add(?x : Dynamic) : Void

Adds the representation of any value to the string buffer.

public addChar(c : Int) : Void

Adds a character to the string buffer.

public addSub(s : String, pos : Int, ?len : Int) : Void

Adds a part of a string to the string buffer.

public toString() : String

Returns the content of the string buffer. The buffer is not emptied by this operation.
